definition: to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to express in words or writing/to make a speech (esp. short introduction, vote of thanks, afterword, funeral homily etc)/to address (an audience)/same as 致詞|致词
to such an extent as to/down to/up to
lit. extreme saturation (idiom)/fig. vividly and thoroughly/in great detail/without restraint/(of a performance) brilliant

sentences.english: Principal Fung Sui Hing giving the welcome speech.
Acute toxicity test, mutation test and single-cell gel electrophoresis(SCGE)were used.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解三氯乙醛的毒性和致突變作用。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effective therapy of acute injury of lung caused by indirect cause morbi.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討間接病因致急性肺損傷的治療。

sentences.english: Objective To study mutagenicity of organic distill from Chaohu lake.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究巢湖水有機提取物致突變性。

sentences.english: David Jones rose to reply for the guests.
sentences.chinese: 大衛瓊斯站起來代表來賓致答辭。

sentences.english: The antiinflammatory effect was demonstrated using auricle edema induced by xylene in mice.
sentences.chinese: 採用二甲苯致小鼠耳廓腫脹觀察其抗炎作用。

sentences.english: Leave work area without taking safe measure, cause company significant loss.
sentences.chinese: 擅離職守，致公司蒙受重大損失者。

sentences.english: The world’s anguish is caused by people between twenty and forty.
sentences.chinese: 世界上的痛苦是由二十歲至四十歲之間的人造致的。

sentences.english: Comrade Yang delivered the opening speech.
OBJECTIVE To explore the pathogenesis of thrombocytopenic purpura caused by sodium valproate treatment.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討丙戊酸鈉致血小板減少性紫癜可能發生機制。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the mutagenicity of Q river surface water.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲了調查Q流域地面水致突變性。

sentences.english: The results show that its mutagenic actvity is negative.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果表明，該藥是致突變陰性。

sentences.english: Taking advantage of abstract line, brilliant color and high-sounding intersperse reveals luxurious feature.
sentences.chinese: 抽象的線條，大膽的顏色和誇張的點綴盡顯致奢華。

sentences.english: P-dichlorobenzene has no mutagenic effect according to these tests.
sentences.chinese: 結論該試驗範圍內，未見對二氯苯有致突變性。

sentences.english: The president will make a speech and propose a toast first, and then the dinner will start.
sentences.chinese: 校長先要致祝酒辭並向大家敬酒，然後就開始了。

sentences.english: The wire guidance enables torpedo to close into homing contact with the target.
sentences.chinese: 有線制導能夠使魚雷接近致自導引觸及目標。

definition: to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to die of illness or injury despite receiving medical help
to lead to/to trigger/to initiate/to cause/to evoke (emotions)
to sustain injuries/wounded (in an accident etc)/harmed
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
to happen/to occur/to take place/to break out
